mdRecord.dcterms:title: Pantagruel, Roy des Dispodes, restitue a son naturel: auec ses faictz & prouesses espouentables / co[m]posez par feu M. Alcofribas abstracteur de quinte essence
Pantagrueline prognostication
Rabelais, François, approximately 1490-1553?. Pantagruel
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Rabelais, François, approximately 1490-1553? [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: Douglas H. Gordon Collection of French Books (University of Virginia) [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Pantagrueline Prognostication, certaine, ueritable & infallible. Pour Lan perpetuel ... : leaves [135]-[147] [original]

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: In ViU copy, the "Pantagrueline Prognostication" is separately bound. Binder: Trautz-Bauzonnet. Bookplates of De La Roche Lacarelle and Mortimer L. Schiff; with J. Coppinger, in gilt, top edge, inside front cover. Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. Gordon list, 701; Gordon list, 702. [original]
